AScry.name: Foresight
AScry.description: Look at the top {{count}} of your deck. Put one into your hand, then discard the rest.

RecipieBook.name: RECIPIE BOOK
RecipieBook.description:
Contains a list of all Formulate Nichole has learned. Cards that create <c=abf5ff>Potions</c> choose randomly from all formuale in this book. 
 
 When you defeat an Elite or a Boss, draft a new Potion to the Recipe book.

PotionBelt.name: POTION BELT
PotionBelt.description: You start each combat with two <c=abf5ff>Potions</c>.

LiquidExtender.name: LIQUID EXTENDER
LiquidExtender.description: You start each combat with a stack of Potion Saver.

ExtraHands.name: EXTRA HANDS
ExtraHands.description: When you play your first <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> each turn, draw a card.

ElixirPoppers.name: ELIXIR POPPERS
ElixirPoppers.description: When you play a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c>, immediately attack for 1 damage.

PlasmaRay.name: PLASMA RAY
PlasmaRay.description: The first time the enemy is hit on a turn, they recieve a stack of Enflame.

FrostRay.name: FROST RAY
FrostRay.description: The first time the enemy is hit on a turn, they recieve a stack of Cryo.

LeadtoGold.name: LEAD TO GOLD
LeadtoGold.description: You gain 1 Perfect Shield at the start of combat. <c=hurt>You draw 1 less card on your first turn.</c>

description.None: Add a random <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> with a random upgrade.
Upgrade a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand to a random side.
description.A: Upgrade a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand or deck to a random side.
description.B: Upgrade a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand to a side of your choice.

description.None: Add a new Formulae to Nichole's Recipie Book.
description.B: Add a new Formulae to Nichole's Recipie Book. Draw 3.
description.A: Add two new Formulae to Nichole's Recipie Book.

description.None: Add a random <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> to your hand. Gain 1 <c=status>temp shield</c>
description.A: Add a random <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> to your hand. Gain 1 <c=status>shield</c>
description.B: Add 2 random <c=abf5ff>Potions</c> to your hand. Gain 1 <c=status>temp shield</c>.

description.None: Play the top <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> from your deck. <c=hurt>Attack 1</c>.
description.A: Play the top <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> from your deck. <c=hurt>Attack 1</c>.
description.B: Play the top <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> from your deck twice. <c=hurt>Attack 1</c>.

description.None: Draft 1 of 3 <c=abf5ff>Potions</c> to your draw pile.
description.A: Draft 1 of 3 <c=abf5ff>Potions</c> to your draw pile.
description.B: Draft 1 of 3 <c=abf5ff>Potions</c> to your draw pile twice.

description.None: Add 2 of the same <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> to your hand.
description.A: Add 2 of the same <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> to your hand.
description.B: Add 3 of the same <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> to your hand.

description.None: Draw and play all <c=abf5ff>Potions</c> from your deck.
description.A: Draw and play all <c=abf5ff>Potions</c> from your deck.
description.B: Draw and play all <c=abf5ff>Potions</c> from your Deck and Discards.

description.A: Duplicate a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand, draw pile, or discards.
description.B: Duplicate a <c=abf5ff>Potion</c> in your hand twice.

Enflame.name: Enflame
Enflame.description: At the end of the turn, this ship takes {0} damage, and Enflame decreases by 1.

Cryo.name: Cryo
Cryo.description: The next hit deals {0} additional damage to this ship.

AcidTip.name: Acid Tip
AcidTip.description: Your next attack applies {0} corrosion to the target.

AcidSource.name: Acid Source
AcidSource.description: Each attack for the rest of the turn deals {0} corrosion to the target.

SuperStun.name: Super Stun
SuperStun.description: Each attack for the rest of the turn stuns the target.

PotionSaver.name: Potion Saver
PotionSaver.description: The next Potion card you play isn't consumed.

Nichole.name: Nichole
Nichole.description:
<c=f8d280>NICHOLE</c>
Your ship's biochemical engineer. Nichole generates, upgrades, and uses <c=abf5ff>potions</c> to support other characters.
